SEARCH
Package Person

Class Guest.Reservation

java.lang.Object
Person.Guest.Reservation
Enclosing class:
Guest
public class Guest.Reservation extends Object
The Reservation class represents a reservation in the cruise booking system.

This class provides a convenient way to store and retrieve reservation details, such as the cruise name, room, start date, end date, and ID.

Key features of the Reservation class include:

  • Retrieval of the cruise name using the getCruiseName method.
  • Retrieval of the room using the getRoom method.
  • Retrieval of the start date using the getStartDate method.
  • Retrieval of the end date using the getEndDate method.
  • Retrieval of the ID using the getId method.

  • Constructor Details

    • Reservation

      public Reservation(String cruiseName, Cruise.Room room, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, int id)
      Constructs a new Reservation object with the specified attributes.

      This constructor initializes a reservation with the provided cruise name, room, start date, end date, and ID.

      Parameters:
      cruiseName - the name of the cruise for the reservation.
      room - the room for the reservation.
      startDate - the start date for the reservation.
      endDate - the end date for the reservation.
      id - the ID for the reservation.
